param.name: from_user
param.label: From
param.description: Input the user id of the user sending the message. Set to 0 for guest.

param.name: from_name
param.label: From Name
param.description: Input the name of the guest sending the message.

param.name: from_email
param.label: From Email Address
param.description: Input the email address of the guest sending the message.

param.name: to_user
param.label: To
param.description: Input the user id of the user receiving the message.

param.name: reply_to
param.label: Reply To
param.description: Optionally input the message id of the message this is replying to.

param.name: message
param.label: Message
param.description: Optionally input private message to include with invite email.

param.name: from_system
param.label: System Message
param.description: Select if this message should be sent from the system. It will not link back to the from user personally, but the message will still belong to the from user.
